d:
Erotic drawings of Sheva Alomar from Resident Evil 5.
No 3d renders and no AI generated images, only hand-drawn artwork.

Complete list of featured artists, in order of appearence and with page numbers in brackets:

Luchidart (1), Nymphennoten (2-3), Shibusun (4-5), Bilnsfw (6-8), Johnfoxart (9), Thesquiddycipher (10), Yoracrab (11), Type dog (12-15), Jace (16-17), Azasuke (18-20), Topsu (21), Stregatto (22), Untitled (23-25), Flhourart (26), Hentaix (27), L0ngsword (28-29), Ryao (30), Lewdpala (32-33), Koutaru (34-35), Nikochan (36), Iron Dullahan (37-40), Falcon creative (41), Nabe071 (43-44), Nanabe78 (45), 31indm4ster (46), Artz (47), Bbmbbf (48-50), Aleksandgrav (51-52), Ange1witch (53-54), Digitaldefeat (55), Artbytrickymartinis (56), Butcha u (57-69), Hidrapink (60), Cabertartwork (61-62), Gonzalo Gomez (63), Jakurson z (64), Negarobo (66), Drak Vanessa (67-68), Impalingpoetry (69), Khartemis (70-72), Neosun (73/126), Reinbach (74), Onemienix (75), Deareditor (76-77), The tentacle professor (78-80), Sataou Shouji (81), Sparkietheartist (82-83), Solidusgrilo (84), Size hermitage (85), Cornellyc (86-87), Disarten (88), Wishpiddle (90), Darkdux (91), Lordguyis (92), Peachcoffeart (94), Optionaltypo (95), Hagfish (96), Tvirus (98), Hsefra (99), Sinnamonlatte (100), Sparrow (101), Streachybear (102), Mugensaku (103-108), Garlock (109), Edithemad (111-115), Nibba (116), Machine54 (117), Meinfischer (118), Dominodancing33 (120), Rampage0118 (121-123), Hombre Blanco (124), Naototedeno (125), Kogeikun (129), Mousoun Kun (130), Superboin (131), Virusinfectedart (132-135), Phazyn (136-137), Tadashibaka (138), Greyfox (139), Gureko Rouman (140), Zpark (141), Ultiblackfire (142), Biggy Deez (143-144), Grandchaossr (146), Yanartdraws (147-148), Sawao (149-165), Skelebomb (166), John Joseco (167), Igfalcon (168), Rocner (169).

The authors of the artwork in pages: 31, 42, 65, 89, 93, 97, 110, 119, 127, 128 and 145 couldn't be identified. If anyone knows the artists of those drawings please let me know in the comments, so they can be properly credited.

I want to thank all the artists which have made this post possible by sharing their artwork online and I hope that you enjoy this gallery for a wonderfull but underappriciated character.
